General Disclosures 2016102-1 Name of the organization AerCap Holdings N.V.
102-2 Activities, brands, products, and services P3. About AerCap
102-3 Location of headquarters Dublin, Ireland
102-4 Location of operations Dublin, Shannon, Los Angeles, Singapore, Amsterdam, Shanghai, Abu Dhabi, Seattle and Toulouse
102-5 Ownership and legal formAerCap Holdings N.V. is a Dutch incorporated company which is centrally managed and controlled 
from Ireland. Our ordinary shares are listed on the New York Stock Exchange
